title: Claiming Her Tomorrows
description: From the moment he met Laila Williams, Aiden Ross knew he wanted her, all of her, but she wasn’t interested, or so he thought.Far too familiar with the machinations of musicians, Laila has been there and done that. With her future in the air, Laila turns the gorgeous bassist from Crimson Rush down flat, regardless of the intense feelings he arouses in her. Aiden won’t give up. Frustrated with his refusal to move on, Laila offers him a quickie in the mezzanine assuming a one-night stand was all he needed.She was mistaken.Aiden’s no fool and eagerly takes what Laila offers, determined to enjoy every second, but knows once could never be enough and only forever will do. He insinuates himself in her life, sets out to overcome her fears of the future, and prove he is the only man who will be Claiming Her Tomorrows.
author: Rae Spencer
